mapper.insert: insert into article(title, content, summary, user_id, category_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{title},#{content},#{summary},#{user.id},#{category.id},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: select article.id, article.title, article.content, article.create_time, article.update_time, user.id as user_id, user.avatar, user.username, category.id as category_id, category.name from article, user, category where article.user_id = user.id and article.category_id = category.id and article.id = #{articleId}
